verbs: Winter is coming... along with more problems
A Lannister always pays his debts... eventually
The night is dark and full of deadlines
Valar Morghulis... especially this project
Valar Dohaeris... whether we like it or not
When you play the game of thrones, you mostly lose
The North remembers... every mistake you made
Dracarys! ...nothing happened
Hold the door! ...it didn't help
What is dead may never die, but it'll haunt you
Fire and blood... and more debugging
Chaos is a ladder... that's on fire
You know nothing... and neither do I
A mind needs rest... which it won't get
The things I do for this project (sigh)
Not today... maybe tomorrow... probably not
Fear cuts deeper than swords... and meetings
A lion does not concern himself... but should
All men must die... of exhaustion
The night gathers... and it's going to be long
I drink and I know things... both are coping mechanisms
Bend the knee... to unrealistic deadlines
By what right? ...good question
Any man who must say he's competent probably isn't
Power resides where people pretend it resides
